# Figure 2

## NFATsig and MeCP2  in bone lesions versus orthotopic tumors
The analysis is based on GSE110451.

```{r}
NFATsig<-c("FAP","COL3A1","ASPN","MRC2","ANGPTL2","MGP","CAVIN1","TWIST1")
NFATsig<-NFATsig[NFATsig %in% rownames(human_count_gene)]
NFAT_sig <- apply(human_count_gene[NFATsig, ], 2, sum)
boxplot(NFAT_sig ~ human_count.ann$type)
t.test(NFAT_sig ~ type, human_count.ann)


boxplot(human_count_gene["MECP2",] ~ human_count.ann$type)
title(main="CX43")
t.test(human_count_gene["MECP2",] ~ human_count.ann$type)
```
